extendedInfo.description: Winter has come to Rabbit Monsterâs world. Let us find out rabbit monsterâs winter *** Features- High quality : Launcher for Ice Cream Sandwich / Jellybean (from Android ICS/JB 4.0.2) - Light & Easy : Offers Select Options by light and easy launcher - Stylish : Stylish UI with backgrounds, icons, and points colors - Smart : Optimized themes for ICS, Automatically supporting existing launcher such as SSKIN and Go Launcher - Fun: Offers fun-interactive themes by various backgrounds, live backgrounds and ICSâs widgets*** Atom Launcher Spec. - Supports for ICSâs widgets and menu: Widgets located on upper side of screen (search bar or clock)  - Available for Changing Display Settings on Hidden Dock: Emotional Filter Effect, Various Screen Switching, Opacity Adjustment- Available for Changes by Setting Point Color Changes: Available for Color Changes for widgets, Menu, Guide, or icons  - Live Background: Changes to dull backgrounds with dynamic backgrounds- Wide-Range Theme Support: Wide-range theme support by Atom Launcher and also existing SSKIN and GO Launcher themes- Badge: Display missed call, unread message (Supprots only defalt apps on your Android device, Could not support the funtion by devices)*** Attention- Available from above Android OS 4.0.2 version- The application needs 10 MB in total to save theme resources. - Because of enhancing usability, installed theme doesnât appear- Not Available for Tab Device (X-large screen)*** Customer SupportPlease leave reviews or comments on Google play reviewsYour review will be appreciated. For more information or support, please visit - Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/atom.themes

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: You guys are awesome, it\'s hard to find playful yet adult looking themes and these are beautiful, the only issue I have is none of them can be moved to SD.  So I hope that changes in the future, I look forward to the new themes you will put out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best thing I ever did for my phone
reviews.comment: No one has this theme,  stinks to be them, but it\'s easy to down load, so then its just so cool! Love it like crazy!
reviews.author: jeni gifford

reviews.title: My Favorite
reviews.comment: For me this is the best Atom theme... Love. Love. Love
reviews.author: Analy Coching
